ShortDescription.Value: This Pack adds 4 train variations, consisting of different lengths

Publish.LongDescription:
## Long Train Variation Asset Pack
### Warning These trains might be too long for some stations. Please check if your trains are disappearing and use shorter trains on these routes.
This Pack adds 4 train variations in different lengths, including a double size standard train. All variations exist for EU and NA themed train.
## New Assets - EU/NA Passenger Train (2x8 Segment) (cap. 1680) - EU/NA Passenger Train (9 Segment) (cap. 960) - EU/NA Passenger Train (10 Segment) (cap. 1080) - EU/NA Passenger Train (11 Segment) (cap. 1200)
